Posts.Content: Bostoniangal25 wrote: Hello ladies, I m in a rush to get lash and brow gel that ships til Wednesday August 29- that my second chemo T C. I think Brian Joseph is good product but they don't work on weekends and shipping is 8$ . I need something from Amazon - similar . Any ideas please- help me to save my brows and lashes. Thsnk you do much!!! Dx 5/30/2018, DCIS/IDC, Left, <1cm, Stage IB, Grade 3, 1/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 7/3/2018 Mastectomy: Left; Reconstruction (left): Silicone implant Surgery 7/3/2018 Mastectomy: Left; Reconstruction (left): Silicone implant; Reconstruction (right): Silicone implant Chemotherapy Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Eye lash and brow gel for fast delivery ? Bostoniangal25 Bostoniangal25
